StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNWAByRowGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @guidNwaID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SELECT [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] as PersonID ,[NWA_ID] ,[NWA_DECLARED_DATE] ,[NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING] ,[PARENTAL_CONSENT] ,[PROJECTED_SHIP_MONTH] ,[NWA_LOG_NOTES] ,[PROJECTED_PROG_CHOICE1] ,[PROJECTED_PROG_CHOICE2] ,[PROJECTED_PROG_CHOICE3] ,[ACTIVITY_CODE] ,[SOURCE_CODE] ,[SOURCE_CODE_DUAL] ,[RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID] ,[ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID] ,[WORKING_RECRUITER_ID] ,[CATEGORY_CODE] ,[EDUCATION_LEVEL] ,[EDUCATION_CODE] ,[PPC] ,[BACH_GRAD_YEAR] ,NWA.[USER_LOGIN] ,NWA.[UPDATE_DATE] ,NWA.[rowguid] ,[OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE] ,[SHIP_MISSION] ,NWA.[EMAIL_ADDRESS] ,[RAPP_ISSUE_DATE] ,[RAPP_SUBMIT_DATE] ,[BACH_GRAD_MONTH] ,[NATIONAL_CALL_TO_SERVICE] ,[OCCR] ,COALESCE(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(RCRTR.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(RCRTR.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(RCRTR.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_NAME ,[OFC_NWA_LOG_NOTE] ,NWA.[rowguid] ,NWA.[Evalua.on] ,NWA.[1stDutySta.on] ,NWA.[ProvenPerformer] ,NWA.SourceDualDesc ,[Miscellaneous1] ,[Miscellaneous2] ,[Miscellaneous3] FROM [dbo].[NWA] WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] RP ON RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = NWA.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] RCRTR ON RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = RCRTR.PERSON_ID WHERE NWA.[rowguid] = @guidNwaID
